程序包 encode

类 WheelGroup

java.lang.Object
encode.WheelGroup
public class WheelGroup extends Object

  • 字段详细资料

    • wheels

      private ArrayList<Wheel> wheels
      Many wheels can form a wheel group. ArrayList wheels stores several wheels.

    • size

      private int size
      The size of the wheel group. i.e. the number of wheels.

    • retMap

      private char[][] retMap
      After the encryption of the wheels in the group, the character should go back and have another time of encryption. The retMap is the map for the character when it goes from the last wheel to that wheel.

  • 构造器详细资料

    • WheelGroup

      public WheelGroup()
      Given no parameter, generate a default wheel group with 3 wheels, with seed 0 and init 0.

    • WheelGroup

      public WheelGroup(int[] seeds)
      Given an array of seeds
      参数:
      seeds - Seeds list.

    • WheelGroup

      public WheelGroup(int[] seeds, int[] inits)
      Given seeds list and inits list
      参数:
      seeds - Seeds list
      inits - Inits list

    • WheelGroup

      public WheelGroup(int num)
      Generate a group with num wheels
      参数:
      num -

    • WheelGroup

      public WheelGroup(int num, int[] seeds)
      Given num and seeds listm but only the first num seeds are active
      参数:
      num - How many wheels
      seeds - seeds list

    • WheelGroup

      public WheelGroup(int num, int[] seeds, int[] inits)
      Given seeds list and inits list but only the first num are active.
      参数:
      num - How many wheels
      seeds - Seeds list
      inits - Inits list

  • 方法详细资料

    • addWheel

      private void addWheel(int seed, int init)
      Add a new wheel to the group
      参数:
      seed - The seed for the new wheel
      init - The init for the new wheel

    • setSize

      private void setSize(int num)
      Set the size of the wheel group
      参数:
      num -

    • genRet

      private char[][] genRet(int seed)
      Generate a random retMap with a given seed
      参数:
      seed - The seed to generate the retMap
      返回:
      return the retMap

    • rotate

      public void rotate()
      Rotate the group. When executing this method, only the first wheel will rotate. Then check whether the other wheels should turn.

    • checkDigit

      private void checkDigit()
      Check whether the next wheel and other wheels should rotate. If the first wheel turned one cycle, the next wheel should rotate once. And so on

    • toString

      public String toString()
      覆盖:
      toString 在类中 Object

    • switchChar

      public char switchChar(char in)
      To encrypt a character
      参数:
      in - Character before encryption
      返回:
      After encryption

    • transform

      private char transform(char c, char[][] cs, int mode)
      Encryption once
      参数:
      c - Before encryption
      cs - Map
      mode - The direction of encryption
      返回:
      After once encryption
